doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Psuedo-peripheral to insert boot code for a Riscv 64-bit Linux kernel boot. Loads simulated memory with a device tree blob file and boot code to set regs and jump to a Risc-v Linux Kernel.

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Master port - connect this to the same bus connected to the Linux processor's data port.

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Name of the device tree blob file. (required when Smart Loader is not disabled)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Set command line passed to kernel. Will override a command line defined in the dtb. (optional)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Append to the kernel command line defined in the dtb. (optional)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Base of main memory region (overrides device tree memory node when membase and memsize both set)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Size of main memory region (overrides device tree memory node when membase and memsize both set)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Address where SmartLoader generated boot code and dtb will be loaded. Jump to this address to start boot process. (default: 0x1000)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Name of boot image file to load at bootaddr, e.g. bbl.bin (optional - may instead load boot elf file with standard --objfilenoentry option)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Address to call from SmartLoader's generated boot code. (default 0x80000000)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Boot convention to use in call from SmartLoader generated boot code (bbl=Berkeley Boot Loader, fsbl=SiFive FSBL). (default: bbl)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Set to True to disable the SmartLoader. (all other parameters are ignored when this is set to True)
